short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Piece New Tab Wallpapers & Games, designed just for one piece lovers. Changes your new tab to a beautiful one piece new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By installing this one piece extension you will replace your default new tab.

FEATURES:

-- Unbelievable animation effects: rain drops, slow motion, snow and rain with each tab.

-- Out of this world widgets: popular sites, rating, time, search box, notes, countdown, weather, google apps & games widgets exists on the new tab page.

-- Save your favorite sites straight from one piece wallpapers new tab.

-- Games - lots of sublime games to play with from your one piece new tab.

-- Set your own wallpapers by uploading your own wallpapers as your new tab.
